name: Hera's earrings No2
description:
CODE : AM10-005 No2

Though not an amazon, Hera deserves to be accounted in the amazon collection with her peacock earrings being both imposing and fabulous as a Queen of Gods must be...

Mythology: Hera was the wife and one of three sisters of Zeus in the Olympian pantheon of classical Greek Mythology. Her chief function was as the goddess of women and marriage. The cow, and later, the peacock were sacred to her.Portrayed as majestic and solemn, often enthroned, and crowned with the polos (a high cylindrical crown worn by several of the Great Goddesses).
Hera was known for her jealous and vengeful nature, most notably against Zeus's paramours and offspring. Paris offended her by choosing Aphrodite as the most beautiful goddess, earning Hera's hatred.

Enjoy them and get ready of people turning their eyes on your way ... ;)


~Earring hooks are from surgical steel.
~We sent you along rubber ear nuts, so you won't lose your beautiful purchase! :)
~Read our POLICIES before any purchase.
~Item shipped worldwide, registered, from Greece.

*We are verified by PAYPAL.*

name: Amazon Earrings - Penthesilea
description:
CODE : AM10-006

The Amazons are a nation of all-female warriors in Classical and Greek mythology.
In the Iliad, the Amazons were referred to as Antianeira, which means those who fight like men.
Either mythical or real they represented feminism throughout history for more than 2000 years, and their myth is as much beautiful as is wild. This is what we hope these earrings combine and depict.

PENTHESILEA was an Amazonian queen and sister of Hippolyta, Antiope and Melanippe. Penthesilea had killed Hippolyta with a spear when they were hunting deer; this accident caused Penthesilea so much grief that she wished only to die, but, as a warrior and an Amazon, she had to do so honorably and in battle. She therefore was easily convinced to join in the Trojan War, fighting on the side of Troy's defenders.

HER EARRINGS represent her passion and royal origin (red colour) as well as her advanced ability as a warrior handling a spear (shape).



~Earring hooks are from surgical steel.
~We sent you along rubber ear nuts, so you won't lose your beautiful purchase! :)
~Read our POLICIES before any purchase.
~Item shipped worldwide, registered, from Greece.

*We are verified by PAYPAL.*
